commandDescription: Bundles / zips the resource directory in the bundles directory at the root of an SFDX project and creates / updates the static resource.
arg0: The name of the directory to bundle.  This directory must exist in ./bundles
nameFlagDescription: (Optional). If specified, determines the name of the static resource.  If not specified, name is defaulted to the name of the unbundled directory.
descriptionFlagDescription: (Optional). If specified, determines the description of the static resource.  If not specified, defaults to the name of the unbundled directory.
privateFlagDescription: If set to true, then the static resource is set to Private Cache Control.  Public, otherwise.
